name: The Gunslinger (JasperH)
description:
Alone, armed with naught but a gun bound to your soul, you must fight your way through countless enemies in a final stand against their threat to civilization. Shooting your only weapon will eventually be your downfall, yet staying put and playing defense will get get you nowhere. Death will not fall upon your enemies unless you command it, yet your command is limited. The only way forward is through in this lighting fast bullet hell shooter.

Created in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 43
